Uses of Class
dungeon.entity.EntityLiving

  • Packages that use EntityLiving 
    Package Description
    dungeon.entity
    Represents all entities you can see in the game, like players and other monsters.
    dungeon.entity.monster
    Represents all monsters entities you can see in the game.
    dungeon.rooms
    Represents all rooms you can pass in the game, include room type and available direction enumerations.
